name: Nano Fly
overview: An overhead dungeon collect-em-up. Backup disks - destroy as many as possible. Bonuses, blow them up or pick them up for points a plenty. A new Nano Fly gives you an additional life. Magnet - life this and rockets will home in on your bombs if one is dropped. Visit energy regen to replenish your vitality. Drop a bomb on the restart point if you wnat to restart the level. Pilot the stolen mechanical Nano Fly through the hazardous sectors of Nan-Tech production tower. Destroy the blue print disks in hope that the plans for the invisible super weapon, the Nano Virus, may never blight the world.
